title: Was the Prophet ‎ﷺ  touched  by Shaytan at birth? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: arthur says is the prophet islam among those who have been touched by the shaitaan when they were given birth the hadith excludes only and his mother so in order to say yeah but there is the prophet muhammad islam as well and maybe ibrahim and maybe adam and we can't say this we just follow the hadith as it is and this doesn't mean that there is anything missing or anything wrong or anything defected with our prophet sallallahu alaihi sallam who was the perfect man and the best of allah's creation to ever walk the earth and allah knows that
